Focused_Shot.help: You quickly fire a round from one of your pistols, causing lethal damage to a single target. If the target is also a designated target, additional lethal damage is done.
Focused_Shot.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Dual_Strike.help: You fire a round from each of your pistols. These cause lethal damage and leave wounds that cause lethal damage over time. Additionally, the target's defenses are reduced and there is a chance the target may be knocked down. If the target is also a designated target, additional lethal damage is done.
Dual_Strike.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT (Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe), Special
Dual_Strike.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your defenses have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Barrage.help: You fire a barrage of bullets in a cone in front of you. Affected targets suffer lethal damage with each bullet that hits them. Targets also suffer a reduced chance to hit and may be knocked down. If the target is also a designated target, additional lethal damage is done.
Barrage.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), High DoT (Lethal), -ToHit (Foe), Chance for Knockdown (Foe), Special
Barrage.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your chance to hit has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Storm_of_Bullets.help: You fire numerous bullets at your target so fast that the eye cannot keep up. This causes a warped bullet trajectory, which causes lethal damage with each hit, as well as an additional chance to knock the target back. The lingering effects of the storm reduce the target's attack speed. If the target is also a designated target, additional lethal damage is done.
Storm_of_Bullets.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DoT (Lethal), Knockback (Foe), -DMG(Foe, All)
Storm_of_Bullets.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your attack speed has been reduced.

Disrupting_Shot.help: You take aim and fire a single, powerful round at your target, piercing through any defenses they may have. The target suffers lethal damage from the initial shot, then additional lethal damage from their wound. The target is also exhausted, suffering reduced resistance to damage, regeneration and recovery. If the target is also a designated target, additional lethal damage is done.
Disrupting_Shot.shortHelp: Ranged (Narrow Cone), High DMG (Lethal), Minor DoT(Lethal/Toxic), -DMG(Foe, All), -RES(Foe, All), Special
Disrupting_Shot.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time. Additionally, your damage potential, regeneration and recovery have been reduced.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Staggering_Shot.help: You fire a well aimed round at your target. This round strikes the target in a vulnerable spot, causing lethal damage and staggering them. The affected target is stunned and suffers reduced damage, defense, healing and chance to hit. If the target is also a designated target, additional lethal damage is done.
Staggering_Shot.shortHelp: Ranged, Superior DMG (Lethal), -DMG (Foe, All), -DEF (Foe, All), -ToHit (Foe), +RES (Foe, Heal), Stun (Foe), Special
Staggering_Shot.targetHelp: You have been stunned. Additionally, your damage, defense, healing and chance to hit have been reduced.

Targeting_Data_Acquired.help: You update the targeting information available to all nearby allies, improving their chance to hit. Attack speed is also increased, as the more accurate information means your allies spend less time needing to prepare their attacks. Though targeting information is updated every 30 seconds, the most current update is only accurate for a portion of the time between updates, so this bonus will fall off before the next update can occur.

Target_Designator.help: You paint a single target with a designator mark that allows you to do more damage against it. Setting a target is interruptible.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} paints you with a {PowerName}, enabling its attacks to be more effective against you.
Targeted
